pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President Moon Jae-In of the Republic of Korea | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with President Moon Jae-In of the Republic of Korea. On behalf of all Canadians, Prime Minister Trudeau expressed his deep sorrow to President Moon Jae-In for the Korean nationals that were killed and injured in the vehicular attack in Toronto on April 23, 2018.

The two leaders also discussed the positive developments on the Korean Peninsula, including the historic summit between the Republic of Korea and the Democratic Peopleâ€™s Republic of Korea.
